name: Amber Wright
body:
###What I'm doing
I am currently completing a bioinformatics internship as part of my MSc. Systems Biology (University of Warwick, UK) at [Illumina Inc](http://www.illumina.com/).  The code for this project will be released after my internship under the [Illumina open-source license](https://cloud.github.com/downloads/sequencing/licenses/General_Illumina_Open_Source_License_Template_1_Final.pdf)

###What I'm working on
My current project is 'Systematically building and evaluating a gold standard set of somatic variants'.  This project attempts to establish a truth set of cancer variant calls by comparing and combining information from tumor normal matched samples derived from multiple biological sequencing replicates/pipelines.

###Professional Details
My CV can be found [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4i6-FH6REsxRm9aT0ZnYkpHU1k/edit?usp=sharing)
